attributes.action: Award Francis Morgan Thompson a knighthood for his contribution to sport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Francis Morgan Thompson also known as 'Daley Thompson' has probably been one of our nations most successful athletes and I think he deserves full recognition for it.
He currently has been awarded the CBE, however I do not feel this justifies his contribution to british sport. 
This great athlete, for all his services to our nation deserves much more than what he currently has been given.
I urge anyone who appreciates his lifetime contribution to sport to sign up and give this man what he deserves.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
